sourcesContent:
"use client" import React, { useState, useMemo } from "react" import { Bed, Users, Heart, CreditCard, Home, Wifi, Tv, Snowflake, Utensils, Bath, X, Droplets, Dumbbell, Car, WashingMachine, Shirt, PhoneCall, BellRing, Plus, Search, Filter, } from "lucide-react" import { Button } from "../components/ui/button" import { Input } from "../components/ui/input" type RoomStatus = 'available' | 'occupied' | 'maintenance' | 'reserved' | 'cleaning' interface RoomDetailsModalProps { isOpen: boolean onClose: () => void room: { id: string number: string type: string floor: number status: RoomStatus capacity: number guestName?: string guestEmail?: string guestPhone?: string checkIn?: string checkOut?: string specialRequests?: string amenities: string[] view: string } } const statusColors: Record = { available: { bg: "bg-emerald-50", text: "text-emerald-700", border: "border-emerald-200", }, occupied: { bg: "bg-rose-50", text: "text-rose-700", border: "border-rose-200", }, maintenance: { bg: "bg-amber-50", text: "text-amber-700", border: "border-amber-200", }, reserved: { bg: "bg-purple-50", text: "text-purple-700", border: "border-purple-200", }, cleaning: { bg: "bg-blue-50", text: "text-blue-700", border: "border-blue-200", }, } const roomTypeIcons = { standard: , deluxe: , suite: , family: , executive: , } const roomAmenities = [ { icon: , label: "WiFi" }, { icon: , label: "TV" }, { icon: , label: "AC" }, { icon: , label: "Bathtub" }, { icon: , label: "Shower" }, { icon: , label: "Breakfast" }, { icon: , label: "Gym" }, { icon: , label: "Parking" }, { icon: , label: "Laundry" }, { icon: , label: "Iron" }, { icon: , label: "Phone" }, { icon: , label: "Wake-up" }, ] const sampleRooms: RoomDetailsModalProps["room"][] = [ { id: "1", number: "101", type: "standard", floor: 1, status: "available", // âœ… typed as RoomStatus capacity: 2, amenities: ["WiFi", "TV", "AC"], view: "City View", }, { id: "2", number: "102", type: "deluxe", floor: 1, status: "occupied", capacity: 4, guestName: "John Doe", guestEmail: "john.doe@example.com", guestPhone: "123-456-7890", checkIn: "2023-10-01", checkOut: "2023-10-05", amenities: ["WiFi", "TV", "AC", "Bathtub"], view: "Ocean View", }, ] const RoomDetailsModal: React.FC = ({ isOpen, onClose, room }) => { if (!isOpen) return null const status = statusColors[room.status] || statusColors.available return (

Room {room.number}

{room.type} Room

Room Details

Status: {room.status.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + room.status.slice(1)}
Floor: {room.floor}th Floor
Capacity: {room.capacity} {room.capacity === 1 ? 'Guest' : 'Guests'}
View: {room.view.toLowerCase()}
{room.guestName && (

Guest Information

Name:

{room.guestName}

{room.guestEmail && (
Email:

{room.guestEmail}

)} {room.guestPhone && (
Phone:

{room.guestPhone}

)} {room.checkIn && (
Check-in:

{room.checkIn}

)} {room.checkOut && (
Check-out:

{room.checkOut}

)}
)}

Amenities

{room.amenities.map((amenity, index) => ( {roomAmenities.find((a) => a.label.toLowerCase() === amenity.toLowerCase())?.icon} {amenity} ))}
{room.specialRequests && (

Special Requests

{room.specialRequests}

)}
) } const RoomsManagement: React.FC = () => { const [selectedRoom, setSelectedRoom] = useState(null) const [isModalOpen, setIsModalOpen] = useState(false) const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState("") const [statusFilter, setStatusFilter] = useState("all") const [floorFilter, setFloorFilter] = useState("all") const [sortBy, setSortBy] = useState<"number" | "capacity">("number") const [sortOrder, setSortOrder] = useState<"asc" | "desc">("asc") const filteredRooms = useMemo(() => { return sampleRooms .filter((room) => { const matchesSearch = room.number.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || room.type.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || (room.guestName?.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ?? false) const matchesStatus = statusFilter === "all" || room.status === statusFilter const matchesFloor = floorFilter === "all" || room.floor === floorFilter return matchesSearch && matchesStatus && matchesFloor }) .sort((a, b) => { if (sortBy === "number") { return sortOrder === "asc" ? Number.parseInt(a.number) - Number.parseInt(b.number) : Number.parseInt(b.number) - Number.parseInt(a.number) } else { return sortOrder === "asc" ? a.capacity - b.capacity : b.capacity - a.capacity } }) }, [searchTerm, statusFilter, floorFilter, sortBy, sortOrder]) const handleRoomClick = (room: RoomDetailsModalProps["room"]) => { setSelectedRoom(room) setIsModalOpen(true) } const handleCloseModal = () => { setIsModalOpen(false) setSelectedRoom(null) } const toggleSortOrder = (field: typeof sortBy) => { if (sortBy === field) { setSortOrder((prev: "asc" | "desc") => (prev === "asc" ? "desc" : "asc")) } else { setSortBy(field) setSortOrder("asc") } } return (

Rooms Management

Manage all hotel rooms and their status

{/* Filters and Search */}
) => setSearchTerm(e.target.value)} />
{/* Room Grid */}
{filteredRooms.map((room: RoomDetailsModalProps["room"]) => { const status = statusColors[room.status] || statusColors.available return (
handleRoomClick(room)} >

Room {room.number}

{roomTypeIcons[room.type as keyof typeof roomTypeIcons]} {room.type} | {room.capacity} {room.capacity === 1 ? "Guest" : "Guests"}
{room.status.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + room.status.slice(1)}
{room.guestName ? (

OCCUPIED BY

{room.guestName}

Check-out: {room.checkOut}

) : (

AMENITIES

{room.amenities.slice(0, 3).map((amenity: string, i: number) => ( {roomAmenities.find((a) => a.label.toLowerCase() === amenity.toLowerCase())?.icon} {amenity} ))} {room.amenities.length > 3 && ( +{room.amenities.length - 3} more )}
)}

FLOOR

{room.floor}th Floor

VIEW

{room.view.toLowerCase()}

SIZE

{room.type === "standard" ? "25" : room.type === "deluxe" ? "35" : "45"} mÂ²

) })}
{filteredRooms.length === 0 && (

No rooms found

Try adjusting your search or filter to find what you're looking for.

)} {selectedRoom && ( )}
) } export { RoomDetailsModal } export default RoomsManagement
